Pre-Game Insights: India have beaten Pakistan in all of their 12 matches at the T20 and 50-over World Cups.
Pakistan have won 10 games in a row in the UAE.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match is expected to break the records for the most watched ICC event ever.
Others: The match will be the first time the two nations have clashed since the 50-over World Cup in 2019.
India and Pakistan are placed in Group 2 of the Super 12 stage of the tournament along with New Zealand, Afghanistan, Scotland, and Namibia.
The top two in each of the two pools progress to the semi-finals.
